name: Memphis, Bubbleland
description:
Important: Memphis, Bubbleland bus tour grand opening is to happen on Saturday, April 9th, 18:00BST. "Though little remains of that fine era, the Pyramid still stands. Disasters of all forms have reduced this land of leisure to little but sand… pebbles of plastic… yet we know much of the story. From the comfort of the bus, witness historic statues, mansions and golf courses… mythic creatures and deadly curses. Please do not leave your seats."

This is an online multiplayer narrative game about tomb raiding, retail executives and monuments.

You and other players will take the tour at scheduled times.

There are 28 available seats on the bus.

To maximize your chances of getting a seat, we recommend that you launch the game a few minutes before the tour starts. Also, please make sure your computer is connected to the Internet and that the latest version of the game is installed.

___________

The Sand Gardeners are Sam Machell and Colin Le Duc. They are not in any way affiliated with Bass Pro Shops.

Thanks to Yvan, Théo, Arthur for their precious help.
